name: SendEmailToContact
description:
Send an email directly to a specified contact.

Use this tool to send an email to a contact by specifying their contact ID. Ideal for communicating directly with contacts via email.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization to which the contact belongs. It is required for sending the email.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the contact to send the email to.

parameters.name: email_content
parameters.description: JSON object containing `to_mail_ids`, `subject`, `body`, and optional `attachments` for the email.

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

subject.description: Subject of an email has to be sent. Max-length [1000]

body.description: Body of an email has to be sent. Max-length [5000]

attachments.description: Files to be attached to the email. It has to be sent in multipart/formdata

parameters.name: send_customer_statement_with_email
parameters.description: Indicate if a customer statement PDF should be sent with the email. Use 'true' to send, 'false' otherwise.

value_schema.description: Send customer statement pdf with email.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: send_customer_statement
parameters.description: Send customer statement pdf with email.
